channel.title: Gauntlet Con Special: Open Series!
channel.description:
Open series or "open table series," in which you register for each session individually, are a long-time specialty of The Gauntlet and are the way most Gauntlet Hangouts sessions work. Players get a chance to play with the same GM, but the "cast" may change a bit from session to session.
Keep in mind that, for an open series, you will need to sign up for each session individually.
## Maze Rats: The Stygian Library
[Will Broom](https://www.rogues-repast.blogspot.com) ([roguesrepast on Twitter](https://twitter.com/roguesrepast)) runs Emmy Allen's *Stygian Library* with *Maze Rats* in 2 sessions! https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnulO0J3WWP5P3BEXsh https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnulpSaJVXpLqxmRUyF
## HILT // BLADE
Designer-GM @darren runs this mecha game in 3 sessions. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnizNv_OIHOKSZnSfvv https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lniz_F-gVT2K3O96ONC https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LniznPT9lWUmUF0BO6z
## Dungeon World: The Way to Wits End
@Lu.Quade runs this Codex adventure designed by @ignotus in 2 parts. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp1dRgjZO8q6d4BzIF0 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp1e0gGRzf8iFJ7xsWs
## Infinite Galaxies: Welcome to the Edge
@RoryM runs an adventure in his PbtA space game in 2 sessions. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNmzMZVXK7MSNe_4cK https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNnHLoyg3wHU3276l4
## Seacat: Ultraviolet Grasslands
@Asher runs this Luka Rejec module (previously reviewed on [Fear of a Black Dragon](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/the-ultraviolet-grasslands)) in 2 sessions. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpPZR-ZVihOrmyO4bp- https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpPa3ukubF5qroNeBvn
## Masks: Reign of the Super Teens
Jack (@king_taran) will be running this 2-session series. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LogOldVNXnKzI-TwMvX https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LogOxAH-h0HpJZiSJuk
## Hearts of Wulin: Autumn Willow
@Ludovico_Alves will run this 2-part series of @Agatha and @edige23's forthcoming game. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpZ03oI5f8lh1kAngjg https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpZ0Ar8ze7fOPlEIfr5
## Dream Askew: Palm Cove
@Bethany_H runs this 2-part series of Belonging beyond Belonging. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNQ97ktMIS_BnQaHoe https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNQvrnV-tSi0KpnlyE

item.title: Gauntlet Con Special: Open Series!
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Open series or “open table series,” in which you register for each session individually, are a long-time specialty of The Gauntlet and are the way most Gauntlet Hangouts sessions work. Players get a chance to play with the same GM, but the “cast” may change a bit from session to session.

Keep in mind that, for an open series, you will need to sign up for each session individually.
